title: 最近做服务器太累了，给大家先拜个晚年
txt_content: 祝各位mcbbs的兄弟，以后天天开心，感谢mcbbs让我们相遇，国庆出去了喽

replies.author: shzhb888
replies.txt_content: 再过几个月就新年了还拜晚年

replies.author: 左潼学长
replies.txt_content: 国庆快乐哟~

replies.author: smile久伴
replies.txt_content: 国庆快乐~~
国庆快乐

replies.author: hueosf
replies.txt_content: 加油，同样是做服务器的苦逼的人QAQ

replies.author: Asthenia
replies.txt_content: 再过三个月就新年了，我给你拜个早年#滑稽

replies.author: 灰常利害
replies.txt_content: 新年快乐啊 哈哈哈哈

replies.author: GCVillager
replies.txt_content: 你还不如拜早年呢（滑稽）

replies.author: BaiMeow
replies.txt_content: 晚年你是真的秀

replies.author: TN_Scarlet
replies.txt_content: 你这个晚年，，是真够晚了。。。再晚晚都成拜早年了。。哈哈

replies.author: 向文
replies.txt_content: 好 不发锭 差评

replies.author: 说大话的小孩籽
replies.txt_content: 新年好~

replies.author: 安梦梦
replies.txt_content: 做服务器确实挺辛苦，祝国庆快乐~

replies.author: qinaizhu1314
replies.txt_content: 做的什么服务器啊 那么累 熊多搞的么

replies.author: chaiyuzhe
replies.txt_content: 国庆快乐！

replies.author: 向文
replies.txt_content:
早年吧
新年快乐

replies.author: 李舜死
replies.txt_content: 拜什么年啊，国庆才对

replies.author: 涟青233
replies.txt_content: 还有几个月就过新年咯

replies.author: n1529905750
replies.txt_content: 国庆快乐~做公益生存服都感觉特别累TVT

replies.author: COFFE360
replies.txt_content: 再过几个月就到新年了，给你拜个早年

replies.author: 2雯
replies.txt_content: 楼主晚年幸福
